#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define mod (ll)(1e9 + 7)
ll fact[53];
ll fast(ll A , ll B , ll C){
    ll X = 1;
    while(B){
        if(B&1)
            X = (X * A)%mod;
        A = (A * A)%mod;
        B >>=1 ;
    }
    return X ;
}
ll ncr(int N , int R){

    ll Ans =  fact[N];
    Ans = (Ans * fast(fact[N- R] , mod - 2 , mod))%mod;
    Ans = (Ans * fast(fact[R] , mod - 2 , mod))%mod;
    return Ans;
}
int main() {
    cin .sync_with_stdio(false);
    fact[0] = 1;
    for(int i =1;i<= 52;i++)
        fact[i] = (fact[i-1]*i)%mod;
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        int N , K ;
    cin >> N >> K ;
    cout << (ncr(N , K)*fact[K])%mod<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
